00052 /*
00053  *--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00054  *       Class:  DataBusHandler
00055  *      Method:  process_event
00056  * Description:  
00057  *--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00058  */
00059 void DataBusHandler::process_event(IrisEvent* e)
00060 {
00061   //  DRAMCmdState *cmd = new DRAMCmdState();
00062     IrisEvent *event = new IrisEvent();
00063     DRAMCmdState* cmd = ((DRAMCmdState*)e->event_data.at(0));   //TODO needs to set this through manifold kernel's links        
00064     int burstDelay=0;   
00065     burstDelay = (ullint)ceil(ceil(cmd->req.data.size*1.0/DDR_BUS_WIDTH)*BUS_CYCLE);
00066 
00067     switch (e->type)
00068     {   
00069         case START_READ:
00070              event->src = (Component*)this;
00071              event->dst = (Component*)child2;           // towards response handler
00072              event->type = REPLY;       
00073              event->event_data.push_back((void*)cmd);   //TODO needs to set this through manifold kernel's links
00074 #ifdef DEEP_DEBUG
00075              cout << dec << Simulator::Now() << ": " << hex << cmd->req.address << ": DataBus!! Receiving data from DRAM. Will take cycles = " << dec << burstDelay << endl;
00076 #endif  
00077              ((DRAMChannel*)child1)->dramReadCycles += burstDelay;
00078              Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+burstDelay+1, &ResponseHandler::process_event, (ResponseHandler*)event->dst, event); 
00079              break;
00080 
00081         case START_WRITE:       
00082              event->src = (Component*)this;
00083              event->dst = (Component*)child1;           // towards DRAM handler
00084              event->type = START_WRITE; 
00085              event->event_data.push_back((void*)cmd);   //TODO needs to set this through manifold kernel's links
00086 #ifdef DEEP_DEBUG
00087              cout << dec << Simulator::Now() << ": " << hex << cmd->req.address << ": DataBus!! Sending data to be written to DRAM. Will take cycles = " << dec << burstDelay << endl;  
00088 #endif
00089              ((DRAMChannel*)child1)->dramWriteCycles += burstDelay;
00090              Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+burstDelay+1, &DRAMChannel::process_event, (DRAMChannel*)event->dst, event); 
00091              break;
00092         default:
00093                 delete cmd;
00094                 delete event;
00095                 cout << Simulator::Now() << ": I should not come to default of process event in data bus\n";
00096     }
00097    if (prevTime + burstDelay > Simulator::Now())
00098    {    cerr << "Error in databus" << endl;
00099         exit(1);
00100    }
00101    prevTime = (ullint)Simulator::Now();
00102 
00103 
00104    busBusyTime += burstDelay;
00105    ((DRAMChannel*)child1)->dramBusyTime = (ullint)Simulator::Now()+burstDelay;          
00106    ((DRAMChannel*)child1)->dramBankBusyTime[cmd->req.rankNo][cmd->req.bankNo] = (ullint)Simulator::Now()+burstDelay;
00107    ((DRAMChannel*)child1)->dramBusyCycles += (burstDelay-t_CMD);
00108    ((DRAMChannel*)child1)->dramBankBusyCycles[cmd->req.rankNo][cmd->req.bankNo] += (burstDelay-t_CMD);
00109 
00110  //  delete (DRAMCmdState*)e->event_data.at(0);
00111    delete e;
00112 }
